parameter.name: projectId
parameter.description: ID of the project to create task.

parameter.name: endDate
parameter.description: end date of the task. The format should be in ISO 8601 date and time format (e.g.: 2013-12-07T07:00:00+0000).

parameter.name: endDateTimeZone
parameter.description: Standard timezone abbreviations for the task end date (e.g.: PST).

parameter.name: taskId
parameter.description: ID of the task to update.

parameter.name: allday
parameter.description: Boolean value to set the task as all day.

parameter.name: reminder
parameter.description: Reminder for the task. Possible values are '0' and '1'.
